transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Haanji sir.
Customer: Haan Jodhpur se bol raha hu madam.
Executive: Ji main lead aapko.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Mere isme koi hai hi nahi madam koi grahak nahi bola aaj tak kyun time kharab kar rahe ho mere.
Executive: Sir aap usse kariye na hum direct jaake waha pe search kariye abhi aap bol rahe ho ki aap.
Customer: Bhai main usme maine usi ko call laga diya abhi aapne bheja na usi pe hi lagaya maine kaha lagaya do call.

Executive: To phir aapki baat.
Customer: Chalu to karwa do meharbani karo ek order to dila do kisi ko.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ye to madam sab farzi number hai.
Customer: Koi log to galiya bol rahe hai koi wapas photo mangate hai dekhte hi nahi.
Customer: Inko lene ke liye main aise kyun number bhejta hu.
Executive: Sir kyun lead generate hui hai tabhi to aaya hoga.
Customer: Main 17 nahi mang raha hu mujhe to ek de do bas.
Customer: Aap abhi dedo 17 de raha hu mujhe to ek.
Executive: Theek hai main bhejti hu aapko aap use kariye continue ab ho sakta hai sir 10 lead.
Customer: 6 mahine se to madam kar raha hu.
Executive: Sir dekhiye 50-50 ka chance hota hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: 6 mahine se to kar hi raha hu madam call hi kar raha hu 6 mahine se.
Customer: Kisi ne nahi kaha ke mera lena hai.
Customer: Koi ek do janne to poor mahine mein.
Customer: Are 6 mahine to ho gaye kaise use karu.
Customer: Chalu to kara do kisi ko bol ke ek kursi kharida do main maan lunga.
Customer: Koi ek chota bhi hota hai khana banane wala wo bhi nahi lakdi ka naam tak nahi le raha hai koi kya kare madam batao.
Executive: Sir 6 mahine se aap.
Customer: Ye aap bhej rahe ho kya pata kitne din pehle ki hai.
Customer: Wo to phone se dekh hi nahi raha abhi maine call kiya hai jo aapne bheja na.
Hmm.
Customer: Usi ko hi lagaya phir maine.
Executive: Aapne recording nahi bheji mujhe time ki.
Customer: Mera kursi ka kaam hai kursi wala koi bhej do.
Customer: Main to keh raha hu ek kursi bacha do main jaan lunga.
Customer: Ke bhai IndiaMART hai India mein.
Customer: Nahi to farzi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap bhej aap aap lead use kariye continue jo bhi response rehta hai aap mujhe bata dijiyega aur sir meri baat ho rahi thi aapne phir bhi aapne 96 pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan ho rahi hai kya kare phir.
Customer: Ye aap bheje usi pe lagaya wahi.
Customer: Aapne jo bheja wo to koi kitne din pehle gaya lead.
Executive: To sir aap 96 pe bhi call karoge to sir sir aap agar waha 96 wale pe bhi call karoge to hi hum hi call attend karenge.
Customer: To phir karte raho kya dikkat hai.
Executive: To sir 96 pe kyun kar rahe ho sir direct mere number pe kar liya kariye na.
Customer: Maine pata nahi bhai choti kar di kya aise.
Customer: Maine socha duty ghar chale gaye honge kitna baje tak rehte ho duty pe.
Executive: Bas sir nikalne ka time hai abhi.
Customer: Haan isliye maine kaha nikal gaye honge.
Customer: Kisi ko pareshan nahi karna hai maine to ho gaya.
Executive: Main nikal bhi main nikal bhi jaungi sir phir bhi aapka call utha hi lungi aap call karoge to.
Customer: Wo aap dhang se lead bhejte ek baar mere ko chalu karwa do ek grahak.
Customer: Koi permanent nahi bol raha.
Executive: Sir isiliye main bhej to rahi hu aapko continue bhejti hu.
Customer: Kya bhej rahe ho.
Customer: Kuch nahi mila mere ko to bhejane wale mein to ulta jo mere phone pe hai na unpe bhi wo lead wale hai.
Customer: Ab main sabko aapko kya bhej log to galiya bol rahe hai main jhoot nahi bol raha hu log to galiya bol rahe hai.
Customer: Galiya.
Customer: Main tab to maine recording hi chalu karke rakhi hai ab kya kya bhejunga aapko.
Customer: Aap dhang ka koi grahak dekh ke bhej do ek do char kursi.
Customer: Ek baar chalu kara do khali board nahi karwa do bas.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Samajh mein ye to nahi rahega bhai haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Kisi ko bol ke ek kursi ka order dila do.
Executive: Sir theek hai main aapko na kal ek bari recent wali lead bhej deti hu jo aadhe ghante wali aap bol rahe ho.
Customer: Bhej do ye to aap utha ke aise hi bhej dete ho aap bhejo tab kursi ho tab wo to aise padegi sab.
Executive: Sir aap khud bhi waha pe check laga ke wo abhi recent wali waha koi generate hi nahi hui thi is wajah se.
Customer: Wo wo wo to main samajhta nahi hu baki bahut purane ghante bata rahe ho bahut jyada.
Customer: Wo to likha wahi aaya phir kaha aapne bhi koi aisa ho gaya.
Customer: Naye bhejo koi grahak ek do kisi ki baat nahi hai wo dega order to.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ye aadhe log to galiya bol rahe hai dhang ka bhejo koi.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main kal abhi to ja rahe hai abhi nikalne ka time hai main aapko phir kal bhej dungi.
Customer: Kal bhej do kal bhej do main to intzaar karta hi rahunga ek baar khali ek main to ek kursi mang raha hu aap se hazar 2000 ki koi grahak aisa bhej do bas.
Customer: Lakho karodo ka to maine hari pali.
Executive: Haan ji main samajh main samajh gayi kal main aapko aake pehle bhejti hu theek hai aadhe ghante wali jo bhi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Aur koi problem.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aur sir aap waha pe ek bari ek bari aap search kar liya karo.
Customer: Puri problem hi hai.
Executive: Main bol rahi hu sir ki waha pe ek bari search kar liya karo.
Customer: Puri problem hi hai puri 100% problem hi hai main to aapke number pe kar dunga phir.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko na kal ek kal main kal main aake ek bari aapko check karti hu theek hai phir wo aap use kar sakte ho.
Customer: Haan main ye call karta hu nahi isliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says no leads are converting.

- Customer says receiving abusive calls.

- Customer wants a genuine lead.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to send recent leads.

- Executive asked to check leads on portal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send recent leads tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, abusive calls, follow up
